title: Add subtitle text under hero title on dashboard

requirements.text: On the dashboard hero section (frontend/src/pages/EarthquakeDashboard.tsx), add a new subtitle line directly below the existing centered hero title "Real - Time Earthquake Detection Around The World". The subtitle must be rendered as an H2 and must read exactly: "Latest real-time earthquake information around the world". Keep the subtitle centered and visually secondary to the main hero title (smaller size and/or muted color), without changing the existing hero title wording, alignment, or layout.

quotes: now add h2 text below the title text : Latest real-time earthquake information around the world

acceptanceCriteria: The hero section shows the existing title text unchanged: "Real - Time Earthquake Detection Around The World".
A second line appears immediately below the title and is rendered as an H2 with exact text: "Latest real-time earthquake information around the world".
The new subtitle is center-aligned and clearly styled as secondary (e.g., smaller font size and/or muted foreground) across breakpoints.
No other dashboard sections (controls, summary, table/map/split views, footer) change behavior or content.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn/ui sources).
Keep the existing hero title text and its centered layout unchanged; only add the requested subtitle beneath it.
nonGoals: Do not change USGS data fetching, filtering, sorting, map behavior, or table rendering.
Do not change global theming, branding, document title, or favicon assets.
